channel.title: 742 compile error

item.title: 742 compile error
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[code=java]player.applyHit(new Hit(player, Utils.getRandom(15)+5, hit.getLook() != HitLook.MELEE_DAMAGE[/code]
Count how many opening parentheses you have and then count how many closing parentheses you have. They need to be an equal amount.

Read full topic

item.title: 742 compile error
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Two hints:

[ul][li]Count the amount of opening and closing parenthesis you have. Look here:
error: ‘)’ expected
hit.getLook() != HitLook.MELEE_DAMAGE [tt]right over here[/tt][/li]
[li]Use an IDE or a syntax highlighter. Such problems will be either fixed for you or pointed out to you by the program.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

hit.getLook() != HitLook.MELEE_DAMAGE
^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

code:

			if (THIEVING_SUCCESS) {
				player.applyHit(new Hit(player, Utils.getRandom(15)+5,
				hit.getLook() != HitLook.MELEE_DAMAGE
				player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(881));
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(THIEVING_MESSAGE);
				player.lock(1);
			}

– can you send me the right code back? ;s i tried alot to fix it, but i don’t get it
